trans-unit.source: A character string in Octave consists of a sequence of characters enclosed in either double-quote or single-quote marks. Internally, Octave currently stores strings as matrices of characters. All the indexing operations that work for matrix objects also work for strings.

trans-unit.source: A color in HSV space is represented by hue, saturation and value (brightness) levels in a cylindrical coordinate system. Hue is the azimuth and describes the dominant color. Saturation is the radial distance and gives the amount of hue mixed into the color. Value is the height and is the amount of light in the color.
trans-unit.target: 在HSV空间中,颜色由圆柱坐标系中的色相、饱和度和值(亮度)级别表示。色调是方位角,描述的是主色。饱和度是径向距离,给出了混入颜色中的色相量。值是高度,是颜色中的光量。

trans-unit.source: A color in the RGB space consists of red, green, and blue intensities.
trans-unit.target: RGB空间中的颜色由红、绿、蓝三色组成。

trans-unit.source: A color property. <var>arg</var> contains the default color value. When no default color is given, the property is set to black. An optional second string argument may be given to specify an additional set of accepted string values (like a radio property).
trans-unit.target: 颜色属性。 <var>arg</var> 包含默认颜色值。如果未提供默认颜色，则该属性将设置为黑色。可以提供一个可选的第二个字符串参数来指定其他一组可接受的字符串值（如radio属性）。

trans-unit.source: A color value setting the text color for this menu entry.
trans-unit.target: 一个颜色值,设置该菜单项的文字颜色。

trans-unit.source: A colorbar displays the current colormap along with numerical rulings so that the color scale can be interpreted.

trans-unit.source: A colormap is a real matrix, of class single or double, with 3 columns. Each row represents a single color. The 3 columns contain red, green, and blue intensities respectively.
trans-unit.target: colormap是一个实数矩阵,单列或双列,有3列。每一行代表一种颜色。3列分别包含红、绿、蓝三种颜色的强度。

trans-unit.source: A common application for sparse matrices is in the solution of Finite Element Models. Finite element models allow numerical solution of partial differential equations that do not have closed form solutions, typically because of the complex shape of the domain.

trans-unit.source: A consequence is that “pulling back” on the up vector does not pitch the camera view (as that would require changing the target). Setting the up vector is thus typically used only to roll the camera. A more intuitive command for this purpose is camroll.

trans-unit.source: A consequence is that “pulling back” on the up vector does not pitch the camera view (as that would require changing the target). Setting the up vector is thus typically used only to roll the camera. A more intuitive command for this purpose is see camroll.

trans-unit.source: A constant spacing between two points can be provided by the <var>s</var> parameter. If <var>s</var> is a scalar, it is assumed to be the spacing for all dimensions. Otherwise, separate values of the spacing can be supplied by the <var>x</var>, … arguments. Scalar values specify an equidistant spacing. Vector values for the <var>x</var>, … arguments specify the coordinate for that dimension. The length must match their respective dimension of <var>m</var>.
trans-unit.target: <var>s</var> 参数可以在两点之间提供恒定的间距。如果 <var>s</var> 为标量，则假定为所有尺寸的间距。否则，可以通过 <var>x</var> ，…参数提供单独的间距值。标量值指定等距间距。 <var>x</var> ，…参数的矢量值指定该尺寸的坐标。长度必须与它们各自的尺寸 <var>m</var> 相匹配。

trans-unit.source: A diagonal matrix can also be transposed or conjugate-transposed, giving the expected result. Extracting a leading submatrix of a diagonal matrix, i.e., D(1:m,1:n), will produce a diagonal matrix, other indexing expressions will implicitly convert to full matrix.
trans-unit.target: 对角矩阵也可以进行转置或共轭转置，从而获得预期的结果。提取对角矩阵的前导子矩阵，即 D(1:m,1:n) 将产生对角矩阵，其他索引表达式将隐式转换为完整矩阵。

trans-unit.source: A diagonal matrix is defined as a matrix that has zero entries outside the main diagonal; that is, D(i,j) == 0 if i != j. Most often, square diagonal matrices are considered; however, the definition can equally be applied to non-square matrices, in which case we usually speak of a rectangular diagonal matrix.
trans-unit.target: 对角矩阵定义为在主对角线之外具有零项的矩阵。也就是说，如果 i != j ，则 D(i,j) == 0 。最常见的是，考虑对角矩阵。但是，该定义同样适用于非正方形矩阵，在这种情况下，我们通常说的是矩形对角矩阵。

trans-unit.source: A difference between the oct-file interface to structures and the mex-file version is that the functions to operate on structures in mex-files directly include an index over the elements of the arrays of elements per field; Whereas, the oct-file structure includes a Cell Array per field of the structure.
trans-unit.target: 结构的oct-file接口与mex-file版本之间的区别在于，对mex-file中的结构进行操作的函数直接在每个 field 的元素数组的元素上包含一个 index ；而八进制文件结构在该结构的每个字段中都包含一个单元格数组。

trans-unit.source: A further constraint on the sparse matrix storage used by Octave is that all elements in the rows are stored in increasing order of their row index, which makes certain operations faster. However, it imposes the need to sort the elements on the creation of sparse matrices. Having disordered elements is potentially an advantage in that it makes operations such as concatenating two sparse matrices together easier and faster, however it adds complexity and speed problems elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: Octave使用的稀疏矩阵存储的另一个约束条件是,行中的所有元素按其行索引的递增顺序存储,这使得某些操作变得更快。然而,它要求在创建稀疏矩阵时需要对元素进行排序。拥有无序元素是一个潜在的优势,因为它使诸如将两个稀疏矩阵连接在一起的操作变得更容易和更快,然而它在其他地方增加了复杂性和速度问题。

trans-unit.source: A general recommendation for users unfamiliar with these techniques is to use the function repmat for replicating smaller arrays into bigger ones, which uses such tricks.
trans-unit.target: 对于不熟悉这些技术的用户，通常的建议是使用函数 repmat 将较小的阵列复制到较大的阵列中，这使用了这些技巧。

trans-unit.source: A matrix is skew-Hermitian if the complex conjugate transpose of the matrix is equal to the negative of the original matrix: A == -A'. If a tolerance is given then the calculation is norm (A + A', Inf) / norm (A, Inf) < tol.
trans-unit.target: 如果矩阵的复共轭转置等于原始矩阵的负数： A == -A' 则该矩阵为斜-埃尔米特矩阵。如果给出公差，则计算为 norm (A + A', Inf) / norm (A, Inf) < tol 。

trans-unit.source: A matrix is skew-symmetric if the transpose of the matrix is equal to the negative of the original matrix: A == -A.'. If a tolerance is given then skew-symmetry is determined by norm (A + A.', Inf) / norm (A, Inf) < tol.
trans-unit.target: 如果矩阵的转置等于原始矩阵的负数，则矩阵是歪斜对称的： A == -A.' 。如果给定了公差，则偏斜对称性由 norm (A + A.', Inf) / norm (A, Inf) < tol 。

trans-unit.source: A note on terminology: “broadcasting” is the term popularized by the Numpy numerical environment in the Python programming language. In other programming languages and environments, broadcasting may also be known as binary singleton expansion (BSX, in MATLAB, and the origin of the name of the bsxfun function), recycling (R programming language), single-instruction multiple data (SIMD), or replication.
trans-unit.target: 关于术语的注释：“广播”是Python编程语言中Numpy数值环境所流行的术语。在其他编程语言和环境中，广播也可以称为二进制单例扩展（MATLAB中的 BSX 和 bsxfun 函数名称的起源），回收（R编程语言），单指令多数据（SIMD），或复制。

trans-unit.source: A permutation matrix can also be returned from the built-in functions lu and qr, if a pivoted factorization is requested.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要透视分解，也可以从内置函数lu和qr返回置换矩阵。

trans-unit.source: A permutation matrix can be transposed (or conjugate-transposed, which is the same, because a permutation matrix is never complex), inverting the permutation, or equivalently, turning a row-permutation matrix into a column-permutation one. For permutation matrices, transpose is equivalent to inversion, thus P\M is equivalent to P'*M. Transpose of a permutation matrix (or inverse) is a constant-time operation, flipping only a flag internally, and thus the choice between the two above equivalent expressions for inverse permuting is completely up to the user’s taste.
trans-unit.target: 可以置换一个置换矩阵（或共轭置换，这是相同的，因为置换矩阵从不复杂），可以反转置换，或者等效地将行置换矩阵转换为列置换。为置换矩阵，转置相当于反转，从而 P\M 相当于 P'*M 。置换矩阵（或逆矩阵）的转置是固定时间的操作，仅在内部翻转标志，因此，上述两个用于逆置换的等效表达式之间的选择完全取决于用户的喜好。

trans-unit.source: A permutation matrix is defined as a square matrix that has a single element equal to unity in each row and each column; all other elements are zero. That is, there exists a permutation (vector) p such that P(i,j) == 1 if j == p(i) and P(i,j) == 0 otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 置换矩阵定义为在每个行和每一列中具有等于1的单个元素的方阵；其他所有元素均为零。也就是说，存在一个置换（矢量） p ，使得 P(i,j) == 1 如果 j == p(i) 和 P(i,j) == 0 否则。

trans-unit.source: A positive <var>k</var> leads to a left shift; A negative value to a right shift.
trans-unit.target: 正 <var>k</var> 导致左移；负值右移。

trans-unit.source: A prime number is conventionally defined as a positive integer greater than 1 (e.g., 2, 3, …) which is divisible only by itself and 1. Octave extends this definition to include both negative integers and complex values. A negative integer is prime if its positive counterpart is prime. This is equivalent to isprime (abs (x)).
trans-unit.target: 素数通常定义为大于1（例如，2、3，...）的正整数，该整数只能被其自身和1整除。八度扩展此定义以包括负整数和复数值。如果负整数为正数，则为负数。这等效于 isprime (abs (x)) 。

trans-unit.source: A radio property that can have the values "on" or "off" that flags whether the contours to plot are to be filled.
trans-unit.target: 可以具有值 "on" 或 "off" 的无线电属性，用于标记是否要填充要绘制的轮廓。

trans-unit.source: A rational approximation to a floating point number is a simple fraction with numerator N and denominator D such that x = N/D.
trans-unit.target: 理性近似浮点数是与分子的简单分数 N 和分母 D ，使得 x = N/D 。

trans-unit.source: A read only property that contains the data return by contourc used to create the contours of the plot.
trans-unit.target: 一个只读属性，其中包含用于创建绘图轮廓的 contourc 返回的数据。

trans-unit.source: A repeat instruction R_j must either be a scalar or a vector. If the instruction is a scalar then each component of x in dimension j is repeated R_j times. If the instruction is a vector then it must have the same number of elements as the corresponding dimension j of x. In this case, the kth component of dimension j is repeated R_j(k) times.
trans-unit.target: 重复指令 R_j 必须是标量或向量。如果指令是标量，则将维度 j 中 x 的每个分量重复 R_j 次。如果该指令是一个矢量，那么它必须具有相同数量的元件与相应的尺寸的 j 的 x 。在这种情况下，将维度 j 的第 k 个分量重复 R_j(k) （ k ）次。

trans-unit.source: A row vector is a 2-D array for which size (x) returns [1, N] with non-negative N.
trans-unit.target: 行向量是一个二维数组，其 size (x) 返回带有非负N的 [1, N] 。

trans-unit.source: A row vector that selects which dimensions of the calculation will appear in the output <var>y</var>. This is only useful when <var>fcn</var> returns an N-dimensional array in Format 1. The default is to return all output dimensions.

trans-unit.source: A script file also differs from a function file in that the variables named in a script file are not local variables, but are in the same scope as the other variables that are visible on the command line.
trans-unit.target: 脚本文件也不同于函数文件,脚本文件中命名的变量不是局部变量,而是与命令行上可见的其他变量处于同一范围。

trans-unit.source: A script file is a file containing (almost) any sequence of Octave commands. It is read and evaluated just as if you had typed each command at the Octave prompt, and provides a convenient way to perform a sequence of commands that do not logically belong inside a function.
trans-unit.target: 脚本文件是一个包含(几乎)任何Octave命令序列的文件。它的读取和评估就像你在Octave提示符下键入每一条命令一样,它提供了一种方便的方式来执行一系列在逻辑上不属于一个函数的命令。

trans-unit.source: A second use of indexing is to speed up code. Indexing is a fast operation and judicious use of it can reduce the requirement for looping over individual array elements, which is a slow operation.
trans-unit.target: 索引的第二个用途是加快代码速度。索引是一种快速的操作,明智地使用它可以减少对单个数组元素的循环要求,因为这是一种缓慢的操作。

trans-unit.source: A single dynamically linked file might define several functions. However, as Octave searches for functions based on the functions filename, Octave needs a manner in which to find each of the functions in the dynamically linked file. On operating systems that support symbolic links, it is possible to create a symbolic link to the original file for each of the functions which it contains.
trans-unit.target: 一个动态链接的文件可能定义了多个函数,但Octave根据函数的文件名搜索函数,Octave需要找到动态链接文件中的每个函数。然而,由于Octave会根据函数文件名搜索函数,因此Octave需要一种方式来找到动态链接文件中的每个函数。在支持符号链接的操作系统上,可以为每一个包含函数的文件创建一个到原始文件的符号链接。

trans-unit.source: A valid function name is like a valid variable name: a sequence of letters, digits and underscores, not starting with a digit. Functions share the same pool of names as variables.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效的函数名就像一个有效的变量名一样:一个由字母、数字和下划线组成的序列,而不是以数字开头。函数与变量共享同一个名字。

trans-unit.source: A valid variable name is a sequence of letters, digits, and underscores that does not begin with a digit.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效的变量名是一个不以数字开头的字母、数字和下划线的序列。

trans-unit.source: A valid variable name is composed of letters, digits, and underscores ("_"), and the first character must not be a digit.

trans-unit.source: A variable name is a valid expression by itself. It represents the variable’s current value. Variables are given new values with assignment operators and increment operators. See Assignment Expressions.
trans-unit.target: 变量名本身就是有效的表达式。它代表变量的当前值。使用赋值运算符和增量运算符为变量赋予新值。请参阅赋值表达式。

trans-unit.source: A variable that has been declared global may be accessed from within a function body without having to pass it as a formal parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以从函数体内访问已声明为全局变量，而不必将其作为形式参数传递。

trans-unit.source: A variable that has been declared persistent within a function will retain its contents in memory between subsequent calls to the same function. The difference between persistent variables and global variables is that persistent variables are local in scope to a particular function and are not visible elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 在一个函数中声明为持久性的变量将在后续对该函数的调用之间将其内容保留在内存中。持久变量与全局变量之间的区别在于，持久变量在范围上是特定函数的局部变量，在其他地方不可见。

trans-unit.source: API for portable 2-D and 3-D graphics (https://www.opengl.org). An OpenGL implementation can be used to provide a renderer for Octave’s graphics functions. Octave’s OpenGL-based graphics functions usually outperform the gnuplot-based graphics functions because plot data can be rendered directly instead of sending data and commands to gnuplot for interpretation and rendering. Since Octave 4.0, the default graphics renderer ("qt") has been OpenGL-based.
trans-unit.target: 用于便携式2D和3D图形的API（https://www.opengl.org）。OpenGL实现可用于为Octave的图形功能提供渲染器。Octave基于OpenGL的图形功能通常优于基于gnuplot的图形功能，因为可以直接绘制绘图数据，而不是将数据和命令发送到gnuplot进行解释和渲染。从Octave 4.0开始，默认的图形渲染器（ "qt" ）已基于OpenGL。

trans-unit.source: API for portable 2-D and 3-D graphics (https://www.opengl.org). An OpenGL implementation is required to provide Octave’s OpenGL-based graphics functions. Octave’s OpenGL-based graphics functions usually outperform the gnuplot-based graphics functions because plot data can be rendered directly instead of sending data and commands to gnuplot for interpretation and rendering.
trans-unit.target: 适用于便携式2D和3D图形的API（https://www.opengl.org）。要提供Octave基于OpenGL的图形功能，需要使用OpenGL实现。Octave基于OpenGL的图形功能通常优于基于gnuplot的图形功能，因为可以直接绘制绘图数据，而不是将数据和命令发送到gnuplot进行解释和渲染。

trans-unit.source: Additional arguments determine the shape of the return matrix. When no arguments are specified a single random integer is returned. Two or more arguments will return a multi-dimensional matrix (<var>m</var> x <var>n</var> x …).

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if sparse_auto_mutate is true, all sparse functions test the amount of memory occupied by the sparse matrix to see if the amount of storage used is larger than the amount used by the full equivalent. Therefore speye (2) * 1 will return a full matrix as the memory used is smaller for the full version than the sparse version.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果 sparse_auto_mutate 为true，则所有稀疏函数都会测试稀疏矩阵占用的内存量，以查看所使用的存储量是否大于完全等效的存储量。因此， speye (2) * 1 将返回完整矩阵，因为完整版本所使用的内存小于稀疏版本。

trans-unit.source: Algebraic eigenvalue balancing uses standard <small>LAPACK</small> routines.
trans-unit.target: 代数特征值平衡使用标准的<small>LAPACK</small>例程。

trans-unit.source: Algorithm Note: condest uses a randomized algorithm to approximate the 1-norms. Therefore, if consistent results are required, the "state" of the random generator should be fixed before invoking condest.
trans-unit.target: 算法说明： condest 使用随机算法来近似1-范数。因此，如果需要一致的结果，则应在调用 condest 之前固定随机生成器的 "state" 。

trans-unit.source: Algorithm Note: normest1 uses random numbers during evaluation. Therefore, if consistent results are required, the "state" of the random generator should be fixed before invoking normest1.
trans-unit.target: 算法说明： normest1 在评估期间使用随机数。因此，如果需要一致的结果，则应在调用 normest1 之前固定随机生成器的 "state" 。

trans-unit.source: Algorithm Notes: The <small>LAPACK</small> library provides two routines for calculating the full singular value decomposition (left and right singular matrices as well as singular values). When calculating just the singular values the following discussion is not relevant.
trans-unit.target: 算法说明：<small>LAPACK</small>库提供了两个例程，用于计算完整的奇异值分解（左右奇异矩阵以及奇异值）。仅计算奇异值时，以下讨论不相关。

trans-unit.source: Algorithm Notes: When calculating the full decomposition (left and right singular matrices in addition to singular values) there is a choice of two routines in LAPACK. The default routine used by Octave is gesvd. The alternative is gesdd which is 5X faster, but may use more memory and may be inaccurate for some input matrices. See the documentation for svd_driver for more information on choosing a driver.
trans-unit.target: 算法注释：在计算完全分解时（除了奇异值之外，还有左和右奇异矩阵），可以在LAPACK中选择两个例程。Octave使用的默认例程是 gesvd 。替代方法是 gesdd ，它快5倍，但可能会使用更多的内存，并且对于某些输入矩阵可能不准确。有关选择驱动程序的更多信息，请参见 svd_driver 的文档。

trans-unit.source: Algorithm taken from Golub and Van Loan,
trans-unit.target: 算法取自Golub和Van Loan。

trans-unit.source: Algorithm terminated by OutputFcn.
trans-unit.target: 算法由 OutputFcn 终止。

trans-unit.source: Algorithm: The normal vectors are calculated by taking the cross product of the diagonals of each of the quadrilateral faces in the meshgrid to find the normal vectors at the center of each face. Next, for each meshgrid point the four nearest normal vectors are averaged to obtain the final normal to the surface at the meshgrid point.
trans-unit.target: 算法。法线矢量的计算方法是:取网格中每个四边形面的对角线的交叉乘积,找出每个面中心的法线矢量。接下来,对于每个网格点,将最近的四个法向量进行平均,得到网格点处的最终法线。

trans-unit.source: All Java-based routines are run in the JVM’s shared memory pool, a dedicated and separate part of memory claimed by the JVM from your computer’s total memory (which comprises physical RAM and virtual memory / swap space on hard disk).
trans-unit.target: 所有基于Java的例程都在JVM的共享内存池中运行，这是JVM要求的专用和独立内存部分，它与计算机的总内存（包括物理RAM和虚拟内存/硬盘上的交换空间）有关。

trans-unit.source: All annotation objects share two properties:

trans-unit.source: All arguments must be numeric and either two-dimensional matrices or scalars. If any argument is of type sparse, the output will also be sparse.
trans-unit.target: 所有参数都必须是数字,并且是二维矩阵或标量。如果任何参数是稀疏类型,输出也将是稀疏的。

trans-unit.source: All arguments must be the same size or scalar. For arrays, the greatest common divisor is calculated for each element individually. All elements must be ordinary or Gaussian (complex) integers. Note that for Gaussian integers, the gcd is only unique up to a phase factor (multiplication by 1, -1, i, or -i), so an arbitrary greatest common divisor among the four possible is returned.
trans-unit.target: 所有参数必须是相同大小或标量。对于数组,每个元素都要单独计算最大公因子。所有元素必须是普通或高斯(复数)整数。请注意,对于高斯整数,gcd只有在相位因子(乘以1、-1、i或-i)的范围内是唯一的,所以返回的是四种可能的最大公因子。

trans-unit.source: All of the file formats supported by save and load are supported. In certain circumstances a user class might contain a field that it doesn’t make sense to save, or a field that needs to be initialized before it is saved. This can be done with the saveobj method of the class.
trans-unit.target: 支持 save 和 load 支持的所有文件格式。在某些情况下，用户类可能包含一个没有意义的字段，或者在保存之前需要初始化的字段。这可以通过该类的 saveobj 方法完成。

trans-unit.source: All of the group objects contain data source parameters. There are string parameters that contain an expression that is evaluated to update the relevant data property of the group when the refreshdata function is called.
trans-unit.target: 所有组对象都包含数据源参数。有些字符串参数包含一个表达式，当调用 refreshdata 函数时，该表达式将被评估以更新组的相关数据属性。

trans-unit.source: All of the solvers above, can calculate an estimate of the condition number. This can be used to detect numerical stability problems in the solution and force a minimum norm solution to be used. However, for narrow banded, triangular or diagonal matrices, the cost of calculating the condition number is significant, and can in fact exceed the cost of factoring the matrix. Therefore the condition number is not calculated in these cases, and Octave relies on simpler techniques to detect singular matrices or the underlying <small>LAPACK</small> code in the case of banded matrices.
trans-unit.target: 以上所有求解器都可以计算条件数的估计值。这可用于检测解中的数值稳定性问题，并强制使用最小范数解。但是，对于窄带，三角或对角矩阵，计算条件数的成本很高，实际上可能超过分解矩阵的成本。因此，在这些情况下不会计算条件编号，在带状矩阵的情况下，Octave依靠更简单的技术来检测奇异矩阵或基础的<small>LAPACK</small>代码。

trans-unit.source: All of these classes inherit from the Sparse<T> template class, and so all have similar capabilities and usage. The Sparse<T> class was based on Octave’s Array<T> class and users familiar with Octave’s Array classes will be comfortable with the use of the sparse classes.
trans-unit.target: 所有这些类都继承自 Sparse<T> 模板类，因此都具有相似的功能和用法。该 Sparse<T> 类是基于倍频的 Array<T> 类和用户熟悉倍频的 Array 类将舒适与使用稀疏类。

Separate functions are provided for rotation about each of the principle axes, <var>x</var>, <var>y</var>, and <var>z</var>. trans-unit.source: Also, note that Octave always reserves storage for at least one value. Thus, for empty matrices nnz will report 0, but nzmax will report 1.
trans-unit.target: 另外，请注意，Octave总是保留至少一个值的存储空间。因此，对于空矩阵， nnz 将报告0，但 nzmax 将报告1。

trans-unit.source: Also, the test for positive definiteness is a low-cost test for a Hermitian matrix with a real positive diagonal. This does not guarantee that the matrix is positive definite, but only that it is a probable candidate. When such a matrix is factorized, a Cholesky factorization is first attempted, and if that fails the matrix is then treated with an LU factorization. Once the matrix has been factorized, matrix_type will return the correct classification of the matrix.
trans-unit.target: 同样，对正定性的检验是对带实正对角线的Hermitian矩阵的低成本检验。这不能保证矩阵是正定的，而只能保证矩阵是可能的候选。对这样的矩阵进行分解时，首先尝试进行Cholesky分解，如果失败，则使用LU分解对矩阵进行处理。矩阵分解后， matrix_type 将返回矩阵的正确分类。

trans-unit.source: Although quad returns a nonzero value for ier, the result is reasonably accurate (to see why, examine what happens to the result if you move the lower bound to 0.1, then 0.01, then 0.001, etc.).
trans-unit.target: 尽管 quad 为 ier 返回了一个非零值，但结果是相当准确的（要知道为什么，请检查一下将下限移到0.1，然后是0.01，然后是0.001，等等，结果将如何变化）。

trans-unit.source: Although Octave does not automatically report an error if you call a function with more arguments than expected, doing so probably indicates that something is wrong. Octave also does not automatically report an error if a function is called with too few arguments, but any attempt to use a variable that has not been given a value will result in an error. To avoid such problems and to provide useful messages, we check for both possibilities and issue our own error message.
trans-unit.target: 虽然Octave不会在调用一个参数多于预期的函数时自动报错,但这样做很可能说明有问题。如果调用的函数参数太少,Octave也不会自动报错,但任何使用未给定值的变量的尝试都会导致错误。为了避免这样的问题,并提供有用的信息,我们检查这两种可能性,并发布我们自己的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: Although Octave normally executes commands from script files that have the name
trans-unit.target: 虽然Octave通常会执行来自脚本文件的命令,这些脚本文件的名称是

trans-unit.source: Although Octave uses a compressed column format, it should be noted that compressed row formats are equally possible. However, in the context of mixed operations between mixed sparse and dense matrices, it makes sense that the elements of the sparse matrices are in the same order as the dense matrices. Octave stores dense matrices in column major ordering, and so sparse matrices are equally stored in this manner.
trans-unit.target: 虽然Octave使用的是压缩列格式,但需要注意的是,压缩行格式也同样可以。但是,在混合稀疏矩阵和密集矩阵混合运算的情况下,稀疏矩阵的元素与密集矩阵的顺序相同是合理的。Octave以列主序存储密集矩阵,因此稀疏矩阵同样以这种方式存储。

trans-unit.source: Although a range constant specifies a row vector, Octave does not normally convert range constants to vectors unless it is necessary to do so. This allows you to write a constant like 1 : 10000 without using 80,000 bytes of storage on a typical 32-bit workstation.
trans-unit.target: 尽管范围常数指定了行向量，但是Octave通常不会将范围常数转换为向量，除非有必要这样做。这样，您就可以在不使用典型32位工作站上80,000字节存储空间的情况下编写 1 : 10000 类的常量。

trans-unit.source: Although accepted, the argument <var>-completenames</var> is silently ignored. Octave always returns absolute filenames.
trans-unit.target: 尽管已接受参数 <var>-completenames</var> ,但它会被静默忽略。八度总是返回绝对文件名。

trans-unit.source: Although default values may be set for any object, they are set in parent objects and apply to child objects, of the specified object type. For example, setting the default color property of line objects to "green", for the root object, will result in all line objects inheriting the color"green" as the default value.
trans-unit.target: 尽管可以为任何对象设置默认值，但是它们在指定对象类型的父对象中设置并应用于子对象。例如，将 line 对象的默认 color 属性设置为 root 对象的 "green" ，将导致所有 line 对象继承 color "green" 作为默认值。

trans-unit.source: Although it is possible to put comment lines into keyboard-composed, throw-away Octave programs, it usually isn’t very useful because the purpose of a comment is to help you or another person understand the program at a later time.
trans-unit.target: 尽管可以将注释行放入由键盘组成的一次性Octave程序中，但是它通常不是很有用，因为注释的目的是帮助您或其他人稍后理解该程序。

trans-unit.source: Although it is possible to rewrite all for loops as while loops, the Octave language has both statements because often a for loop is both less work to type and more natural to think of. Counting the number of iterations is very common in loops and it can be easier to think of this counting as part of looping rather than as something to do inside the loop.
trans-unit.target: 尽管可以将所有的 for 循环重写为 while 循环，但是Octave语言同时具有这两种语句，因为通常 for 循环的工作量较小，而且想起来也很自然。计算循环中的迭代次数是很常见的，将计数视为循环的一部分而不是在循环内部进行操作会更容易。

trans-unit.source: An additional input argument thres, that defines the pivoting threshold can be given. thres can be a scalar, in which case it defines the UMFPACK pivoting tolerance for both symmetric and unsymmetric cases. If thres is a 2-element vector, then the first element defines the pivoting tolerance for the unsymmetric UMFPACK pivoting strategy and the second for the symmetric strategy. By default, the values defined by spparms are used ([0.1, 0.001]).
trans-unit.target: 可以提供定义枢轴阈值的附加输入参数 thres 。 thres 可以是标量，在这种情况下，它定义了对称和不对称情况下的UMFPACK枢轴公差。如果 thres 是2元素向量，则第一个元素定义非对称UMFPACK旋转策略的旋转公差，第二个元素定义对称策略的旋转公差。默认情况下，使用 spparms 定义的值（[ 0.1，0.001 ]）。

trans-unit.source: An additional input argument thresh that defines the pivoting threshold can be given. thresh can be a scalar, in which case it defines the UMFPACK pivoting tolerance for both symmetric and unsymmetric cases. If thresh is a 2-element vector, then the first element defines the pivoting tolerance for the unsymmetric UMFPACK pivoting strategy and the second for the symmetric strategy. By default, the values defined by spparms are used ([0.1, 0.001]).

trans-unit.source: An explicit conversion to a full matrix can be requested using the built-in function full. It should also be noted that the diagonal and permutation matrix objects will cache the result of the conversion after it is first requested (explicitly or implicitly), so that subsequent conversions will be very cheap.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用内置函数full显式转换为完整矩阵。还应注意，对角矩阵和置换矩阵对象将在首次（显式或隐式）请求转换结果后对其进行缓存，因此后续转换将非常便宜。

trans-unit.source: An expression can serve as a statement on its own. Most other kinds of statements contain one or more expressions which specify data to be operated on. As in other languages, expressions in Octave include variables, array references, constants, and function calls, as well as combinations of these with various operators.
trans-unit.target: 一个表达式可以单独作为一个语句。大多数其他类型的语句都包含一个或多个表达式,这些表达式指定了要操作的数据。和其他语言一样,Octave中的表达式包括变量、数组引用、常量和函数调用,以及这些变量与各种运算符的组合。

trans-unit.source: An important use of the Delaunay tessellation is that it can be used to interpolate from scattered data to an arbitrary set of points. To do this the N-simplex of the known set of points is calculated with delaunay or delaunayn. Then the simplices in to which the desired points are found are identified. Finally the vertices of the simplices are used to interpolate to the desired points. The functions that perform this interpolation are griddata, griddata3 and griddatan.
trans-unit.target: Delaunay细分的一个重要用途是可以用于将分散的数据插值到任意点集。为此，使用 delaunay 或 delaunayn 计算已知点集的N-单形。然后，识别出在其中找到所需点的单纯形。最后，将单纯形的顶点插值到所需的点。执行此插值的函数是 griddata ， griddata3 和 griddatan 。

trans-unit.source: An index expression consists of a set of parentheses enclosing M expressions separated by commas. Each individual index value, or component, is used for the respective dimension of the object that it is applied to. In other words, the first index component is used for the first dimension (rows) of the object, the second index component is used for the second dimension (columns) of the object, and so on. The number of index components M defines the dimensionality of the index expression. An index with two components would be referred to as a 2-D index because it has two dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 索引表达式由一组括号组成，这些括号包含用逗号分隔的M个表达式。每个单独的索引值或分量都用于对其应用到的对象的相应尺寸。换句话说，第一索引分量用于对象的第一维度（行），第二索引分量用于对象的第二维度（列），依此类推。索引分量的数量M定义了索引表达式的维数。具有两个分量的索引将被称为2-D索引，因为它具有两个维度。

trans-unit.source: An indexed image consists of an M-by-N matrix of integers and a C-by-3 color map. Each integer corresponds to an index in the color map, and each row in the color map corresponds to an RGB color. The color map must be of class double with values between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 索引图像由整数的M×N矩阵和C×3色图组成。每个整数对应于颜色图中的索引，并且颜色图中的每一行对应于RGB颜色。颜色图必须是 double 类，其值在0到1之间。

trans-unit.source: An indicator of convergence. 0 indicates that the iteration count was exceeded, and therefore convergence was not reached; >0 indicates that the algorithm converged. (The algorithm is stable and will converge given enough iterations.)
trans-unit.target: 趋同指标。0表示已超过迭代次数，因此未达到收敛；> 0表示算法已收敛。（该算法稳定，并且在进行足够的迭代后会收敛。）

trans-unit.source: An inequality with a lower bound (A(i,:)*x >= b(i)).
trans-unit.target: 下界不等式（ A(i,:)*x >= b(i) ）。

trans-unit.source: An optional decimal integer specifying the minimum field width. If the normal conversion produces fewer characters than this, the field is padded with spaces to the specified width. This is a minimum value; if the normal conversion produces more characters than this, the field is not truncated. Normally, the output is right-justified within the field.
trans-unit.target: 一个可选的十进制整数，指定最小字段宽度。如果普通转换产生的字符少于此字符，则将字段填充为指定宽度的字段。这是最小值。如果普通转换产生的字符超过此数目，则该字段不会被截断。通常，输出在该字段内是右对齐的。

trans-unit.source: An optional decimal integer that specifies the maximum field width. Reading of characters from the input stream stops either when this maximum is reached or when a non-matching character is found, whichever happens first. Most conversions discard initial whitespace characters, and these discarded characters don’t count towards the maximum field width. Conversions that do not discard initial whitespace are explicitly documented.
trans-unit.target: 一个可选的十进制整数，指定最大字段宽度。当达到此最大值或发现不匹配的字符时（以先发生者为准），将停止从输入流中读取字符。大多数转换会丢弃初始空白字符，并且这些丢弃的字符不会计入最大字段宽度。明确记录不放弃初始空格的转换。

trans-unit.source: An optional directory containing any files that are directly installed by the package. Typically this will include any m-files.
trans-unit.target: 一个可选目录，包含该软件包直接安装的所有文件。通常，这将包括任何 m 个文件。

trans-unit.source: An optional directory containing files that will be added to the Octave EXEC_PATH when the package is loaded. This might contain external scripts, etc., called by functions within the package.

trans-unit.source: An optional field with the column number at which the error occurred

trans-unit.source: An optional file that includes commands that are run when the package is added to the users path. Note that PKG_ADD directives in the source code of the package will also be added to this file by the Octave package manager. Note that symbolic links are to be avoided in packages, as symbolic links do not exist on some file systems, and so a typical use for this file is the replacement of the symbolic link
trans-unit.target: 可选文件，其中包含将程序包添加到用户路径时运行的命令。请注意，程序包源代码中的 PKG_ADD 指令也将由Octave程序包管理器添加到此文件中。请注意，在软件包中应避免使用符号链接，因为某些文件系统上不存在符号链接，因此该文件的典型用法是替换符号链接

trans-unit.source: An optional file that includes commands that are run when the package is removed from the users path. Note that PKG_DEL directives in the source code of the package will also be added to this file by the Octave package manager. See PKG_ADD and PKG_DEL Directives, for details on PKG_DEL directives.
trans-unit.target: 可选文件，包括从用户路径中删除软件包时运行的命令。请注意，程序包源代码中的 PKG_DEL 指令也将由Octave程序包管理器添加到此文件中。有关PKG_DEL指令的详细信息，请参见PKG_ADD和 PKG_DEL 指令。

trans-unit.source: An optional final argument, which must be a string or cell array of strings, contains options passed to the underlying qhull command. See the documentation for the Qhull library for details http://www.qhull.org/html/qh-quick.htm#options. The default option is {"Qt"}.

trans-unit.source: An optional final argument, which must be a string or cell array of strings, contains options passed to the underlying qhull command. See the documentation for the Qhull library for details http://www.qhull.org/html/qh-quick.htm#options. The default options are {"Qt", "Qbb", "Qc", "Qz"}.

trans-unit.source: An optional final argument, which must be a string or cell array of strings, contains options passed to the underlying qhull command. See the documentation for the Qhull library for details http://www.qhull.org/html/qh-quick.htm#options. The default options are {"Qt", "Qbb", "Qc"}. If Qhull fails for 2-D input the triangulation is attempted again with the options {"Qt", "Qbb", "Qc", "Qz"} which may result in reduced accuracy.
trans-unit.target: 可选的最终参数（必须是字符串或字符串单元格数组）包含传递给基础qhull命令的选项。有关详细信息，请参见Qhull库的文档http://www.qhull.org/html/qh-quick.htm#options。默认选项为 {"Qt", "Qbb", "Qc"} 。如果Qhull无法进行2D输入，则使用选项 {"Qt", "Qbb", "Qc", "Qz"} 再次尝试三角剖分，这可能会导致精度降低。

trans-unit.source: An optional timeout can be specified using the property "timeout". This timeout value is the number of seconds to wait for the condition to be true. timeout must be at least 1. trans-unit.source: Another typical sparse matrix that is often needed is a random distribution of random elements. The functions sprand and sprandn perform this for uniform and normal random distributions of elements. They have exactly the same calling convention, where sprand (r, c, d), creates an r-by-c sparse matrix with a density of filled elements of d.
trans-unit.target: 通常需要的另一个典型的稀疏矩阵是随机元素的随机分布。sprand和sprandn函数执行此操作以使元素均匀且正态随机分布。它们具有完全相同的调用约定，其中 sprand (r, c, d) 创建一个密度为 d 的 r - by- c 稀疏矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Another use of the hashing function is to check for file integrity. The user can check the hash of the file against a known value and find if the file they have is the same as the one that the original hash was produced with.
trans-unit.target: 散列函数的另一个用途是检查文件的完整性。用户可以根据已知值检查文件的哈希值,发现他们所拥有的文件是否与原始哈希值产生的文件相同。

trans-unit.source: Another very basic function is nnz that returns the number of nonzero entries there are in a sparse matrix, while the function nzmax returns the amount of storage allocated to the sparse matrix. Note that Octave tends to crop unused memory at the first opportunity for sparse objects. There are some cases of user created sparse objects where the value returned by nzmax will not be the same as nnz, but in general they will give the same result. The function spstats returns some basic statistics on the columns of a sparse matrix including the number of elements, the mean and the variance of each column.
trans-unit.target: 另一个非常基本的函数是nnz，它返回稀疏矩阵中存在的非零条目数，而函数nzmax返回分配给稀疏矩阵的存储量。请注意，Octave倾向于在稀疏对象的第一个机会时裁剪未使用的内存。在某些情况下，用户创建的稀疏对象的情况下，nzmax返回的值将与nnz不同，但通常它们将给出相同的结果。函数spstats返回有关稀疏矩阵列的一些基本统计信息，包括元素数，每列的均值和方差。

trans-unit.source: Any y values that use a window extending beyond the original data array are deleted. For example, with a 10-element data vector and a window of length 3, the output will contain only 8 elements. The first element would require calculating the function over indices [0, 1, 2] and is therefore discarded. The last element would require calculating the function over indices [9, 10, 11] and is therefore discarded.
trans-unit.target: 使用窗口超出原始数据数组的所有 y 值都将被删除。例如，对于一个包含10个元素的数据矢量和一个长度为3的窗口，输出将仅包含8个元素。第一个元素将需要计算索引为 [0, 1, 2] 的函数，因此将其丢弃。最后一个元素将需要根据索引 [9, 10, 11] 计算函数，因此将其丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Any Octave function can be overloaded, and this allows an object-specific version of a function to be called as needed. A pertinent example for the polynomial class might be to overload the polyval function.
trans-unit.target: 任何Octave函数都可以重载，这允许根据需要调用函数的特定于对象的版本。多项式类的一个相关示例可能是重载 polyval 函数。

trans-unit.source: Any additional arguments are passed directly to <var>func</var>. The total number of arguments to call <var>func</var> with can be passed in <var>ntot</var>; by default <var>ntot</var> is <var>n</var>. The input <var>n</var> can also be a vector of indices of the output, in which case the output will be a cell array of the requested output arguments.
trans-unit.target: 任何其他参数都直接传递给 <var>func</var> 。调用 <var>func</var> 所使用的参数总数可以在 <var>ntot</var> 中传递；默认情况下， <var>ntot</var> 为 <var>n</var> 。输入 <var>n</var> 也可以是输出索引的向量，在这种情况下，输出将是所请求输出参数的单元格数组。

trans-unit.source: Any additional arguments are passed to the error function for processing.
trans-unit.target: 任何其他参数都将传递给 error 函数进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Any arguments after the first are passed as inputs to the named function. For example,
trans-unit.target: 第一个参数之后的任何参数都会作为输入传递给命名的函数。例如:

trans-unit.source: Any arguments which follow x0 are treated as parameters, and passed in an appropriate manner to any of the functions (Afun or Mfun) or that have been given to bicg.
trans-unit.target: 跟随 x0 的任何参数都被视为参数，并以适当的方式传递给任何函数（ Afun 或 Mfun ）或已提供给 bicg 的函数。

trans-unit.source: Any bound (A, b, lb, ub, A_in, A_lb, A_ub) may be set to the empty matrix ([]) if not present. The constraints A and A_in are matrices with each row representing a single constraint. The other bounds are scalars or vectors depending on the number of constraints. The algorithm is faster if the initial guess is feasible.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在任何边界（ A ， b ， lb ， ub ， A_in ， A_lb ， A_ub ），则可以将其设置为空矩阵（ [] ）。约束 A 和 A_in 是矩阵，每行代表一个约束。其他边界是标量或向量，具体取决于约束的数量。如果初始猜测可行，则该算法速度更快。

trans-unit.source: Any character in value will be interpreted as whitespace and trimmed; The default value for whitespace is " \b\r\n\t" (note the space). Unless whitespace is set to "" (empty) AND at least one "%s" format conversion specifier is supplied, a space is always part of whitespace.
trans-unit.target: value 任何字符都将被解释为空格并进行修剪；空格的默认值为 " \b\r\n\t" （注意空格）。除非将空格设置为 "" （空），并且至少提供一个 "%s" 格式转换说明符，否则空格始终是空格的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Any character in value will be interpreted as whitespace and trimmed; the string defining whitespace must be enclosed in double quotes for proper processing of special characters like "\t". In each data field, multiple consecutive whitespace characters are collapsed into one space and leading and trailing whitespace is removed. The default value for whitespace is " \b\r\n\t" (note the space). Whitespace is always added to the set of delimiter characters unless at least one "%s" format conversion specifier is supplied; in that case only whitespace explicitly specified in "delimiter" is retained as delimiter and removed from the set of whitespace characters. If whitespace characters are to be kept as-is (in e.g., strings), specify an empty value (i.e., "") for "whitespace"; obviously, whitespace cannot be a delimiter then.
trans-unit.target: value 任何字符都将被解释为空格并进行修剪；定义空白的字符串必须用双引号引起来，以便正确处理特殊字符，例如 "\t" 。在每个数据字段中，将多个连续的空白字符折叠成一个空格，并删除了前导和尾随空格。空格的默认值为 " \b\r\n\t" （注意空格）。除非提供至少一个 "%s" 格式转换说明符，否则始终将空格添加到定界符字符集；在这种情况下，只有在 "delimiter" 明确指定的空格保留为定界符，并从空白字符集中删除。如果要按原样保留空格字符（例如，字符串），请为 "whitespace" 指定一个空值（即 "" ）；显然，空白不能成为分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Any character in value will be used to split str into words (default value = any whitespace). Note that whitespace is implicitly added to the set of delimiter characters unless a "%s" format conversion specifier is supplied; see "whitespace" parameter below. The set of delimiter characters cannot be empty; if needed Octave substitutes a space as delimiter.
trans-unit.target: value 中的任何字符都将用于将 str 拆分为单词（默认值=任何空格）。请注意，除非提供了 "%s" 格式转换说明符，否则会将空格隐式添加到定界符字符集；请参阅下面的 "whitespace" 参数。分隔符字符集不能为空；如果需要，八度会用空格代替定界符。

trans-unit.source: Any function that the nested function’s parent can call
trans-unit.target: 嵌套函数的父级可以调用的任何函数

trans-unit.source: Any names identified are returned in a cell array of strings. The array is empty if no variables were found.
trans-unit.target: 任何被识别的名称都会以一个字符串的单元格数组返回。如果没有发现任何变量,则该数组为空。

trans-unit.source: Any nonzero values will be converted to true (1) while zero values will be converted to false (0). The non-numeric value NaN cannot be converted and will produce an error.
trans-unit.target: 任何非零值将被转换为真(1),而零值将被转换为假(0)。非数字值NaN不能被转换,并会产生错误。

trans-unit.source: Any number of elseif clauses may appear. Each condition is tested in turn, and if one is found to be true, its corresponding body is executed. If none of the conditions are true and the else clause is present, its body is executed. Only one else clause may appear, and it must be the last part of the statement.
trans-unit.target: 可以出现任意数量的 elseif 子句。依次测试每个条件，如果发现一个条件为真，则执行其对应的 body 。如果所有条件都不为真且 else 子句存在，则执行其主体。只能出现 else 子句，并且它必须是语句的最后一部分。

trans-unit.source: Any number of data sets (<var>x1</var>,<var>y1</var>, <var>x2</var>,<var>y2</var>, …) may appear as long as they are separated by a format string <var>fmt</var>.
trans-unit.target: 只要由格式字符串 <var>fmt</var> 分隔，就可以出现任意数量的数据集（ <var>x1</var> ， <var>y1</var> ， <var>x2</var> ， <var>y2</var> 等）。

trans-unit.source: Any numeric entries in a cell array will be converted to text using sprintf ("%g"). For more precise control of the appearance convert any numeric entries to strings using num2str, sprintf, etc., before calling text.
trans-unit.target: 单元格数组中的任何数字条目都将使用 sprintf ("%g") 转换为文本。为了更精确地控制外观，在调用 text 之前，请使用 num2str ， sprintf 等将任何数字条目转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Any optional <var>format</var> specified by the programmer is used without modification. This is in contrast to <small>MATLAB</small> which tampers with the <var>format</var> based on internal heuristics.
trans-unit.target: 使用程序员指定的任何可选 <var>format</var> ，无需进行修改。这与<small>MATLAB</small>会篡改基于内部启发法的 <var>format</var> 相反。

trans-unit.source: Any parameter whose name contains the name of a type (e.g., <var>integer</var> or <var>matrix</var>) is expected to be of that type. Parameters named <var>object</var> may be of any type. Parameters with other sorts of names (e.g., <var>new_file</var>) are discussed specifically in the description of the function. In some sections, features common to parameters of several functions are described at the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 名称中包含类型名称（例如 <var>integer</var> 或 <var>matrix</var> ）的任何参数都应属于该类型。名为 <var>object</var> 的参数可以是任何类型。具有其他种类名称的参数（例如 <var>new_file</var> ）在函数说明中进行了专门讨论。在某些部分中，开头描述了几个功能的参数共有的功能。

trans-unit.source: Any window elements outside the data array are replaced by NaN. For example, with a window of length 3, y(1) = fcn ([NaN, x(1:2)]), and y(end) = fcn ([x(end-1:end), NaN]). This option usually results in y having NaN values at the boundaries, although it is influenced by how fcn handles NaN, and also by the property "nancond".

trans-unit.source: Apart from the string concatenation functions (see Concatenating Strings) which cast numerical data to the corresponding UTF-8 encoded characters, there are several functions that format numerical data as strings. mat2str and num2str convert real or complex matrices, while int2str converts integer matrices. int2str takes the real part of complex values and round fractional values to integer. A more flexible way to format numerical data as strings is the sprintf function (see Formatted Output, sprintf).
trans-unit.target: 除了将数字数据转换为对应的UTF-8编码字符的字符串连接函数（请参阅Concatenating Strings）之外，还有一些函数将数字数据格式化为字符串。 mat2str 和 num2str 转换实数或复数矩阵，而 int2str 转换整数矩阵。 int2str 将复数值和小数部分的整数部分取整。将数字数据格式化为字符串的一种更灵活的方法是 sprintf 函数（请参见Formatted Output，sprintf）。

trans-unit.source: Append PostScript or PDF output to an existing file of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 将PostScript或PDF输出附加到现有的相同类型的文件中。

trans-unit.source: Append a "t" to the mode string to open the file in text mode or a "b" to open in binary mode. On Windows systems, text mode reading and writing automatically converts linefeeds to the appropriate line end character for the system (carriage-return linefeed on Windows). The default when no mode is specified is binary.
trans-unit.target: 在模式字符串后附加 "t" 以文本模式打开文件，或在 "b" 以二进制模式打开文件。在Windows系统上，文本模式下的读写会自动将换行符转换为系统的相应换行符（在Windows上为回车换行符）。未指定任何模式时的默认值为二进制。

trans-unit.source: Append on each write.
trans-unit.target: 在每写上附加。

trans-unit.source: Append the scalar value <var>c</var> to the vector <var>x</var> until it is of length <var>l</var>. If <var>c</var> is not given, a value of 0 is used.
trans-unit.target: 将标量值 <var>c</var> 附加到向量 <var>x</var> ,直到长度为 <var>l</var> 为止。如果未给出 <var>c</var> ，则使用0值。

trans-unit.source: Append to the destination instead of overwriting.
trans-unit.target: 附加到目的地,而不是覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Application Note: If <var>x</var> is not specified then unit spacing will be used. To scale the integral to the correct value you must multiply by the actual spacing value (deltaX).

trans-unit.source: Application Note: If x is not specified then unit spacing will be used. To scale the integral to the correct value you must multiply by the actual spacing value (deltaX). As an example, the integral of x^3 over the range [0, 1] is x^4/4 or 0.25. The following code uses trapz to calculate the integral in three different ways.
trans-unit.target: 应用说明：如果未指定 x ,则将使用单位间距。要将积分缩放为正确的值，必须乘以实际的间距值（deltaX）。例如，在范围[0，1] 上x ^ 3的积分是x ^ 4/4或0.25。以下代码使用 trapz 以三种不同方式计算积分。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, functions should already be written with matrix arguments in mind and should consider whole matrix operations in a vectorized manner. Sometimes, writing functions in this way appears difficult or impossible for various reasons. For those situations, Octave provides facilities for applying a function to each element of an array, cell, or struct.
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,函数的编写应该已经考虑到了矩阵参数,应该以向量化的方式考虑整个矩阵的运算。有时,由于各种原因,以这种方式编写函数似乎很难或不可能。对于这些情况,Octave提供了将函数应用于数组、单元格或结构体的每个元素的功能。

trans-unit.source: As all of the mixed operators and functions between full and sparse matrices exist, in general this does not cause any problems. However, one area where it does cause a problem is where a sparse matrix is promoted to a full matrix, where subsequent operations would resparsify the matrix. Such cases are rare, but can be artificially created, for example (fliplr (speye (3)) + speye (3)) - speye (3) gives a full matrix when it should give a sparse one. In general, where such cases occur, they impose only a small memory penalty.
trans-unit.target: 由于存在完整矩阵和稀疏矩阵之间的所有混合运算符和函数，因此通常不会造成任何问题。但是，确实会引起问题的一个领域是将稀疏矩阵提升为完整矩阵，随后的操作将重新分配矩阵。这种情况很少见，但是可以人为地创建，例如 (fliplr (speye (3)) + speye (3)) - speye (3) 在应提供稀疏矩阵时给出完整的矩阵。通常，在发生这种情况的地方，它们只会施加很小的内存损失。

trans-unit.source: As before, the leading comments provide documentation for the class constructor. This constructor is very similar to the polynomial class constructor, except that a polynomial object is passed as the third argument to the class function, telling Octave that the FIRfilter class will be derived from the polynomial class. The FIR filter class itself does not have any data fields, but it must provide a struct to the class function. Given that the @polynomial constructor will add an element named polynomial to the object struct, the @FIRfilter just initializes a struct with a dummy field polynomial which will later be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 和以前一样，前导注释为类构造函数提供了文档。该构造函数与多项式类构造函数非常相似，不同之处在于，将多项式对象作为第三个参数传递给 class 函数，告诉Octave FIRfilter 类将从多项式类派生。 FIR过滤器类本身没有任何数据字段，但是它必须为 class 函数提供一个结构。假定 @polynomial 构造函数将向对象struct 添加一个名为 polynomial 的元素，则 @FIRfilter 只是使用一个伪字段 polynomial 初始化一个结构，该伪字段随后将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Avoid calling eval or feval excessively. Parsing input or looking up the name of a function in the symbol table are relatively expensive operations.

trans-unit.source: Avoid computing costly intermediate results multiple times. Octave currently does not eliminate common subexpressions. Also, certain internal computation results are cached for variables. For instance, if a matrix variable is used multiple times as an index, checking the indices (and internal conversion to integers) is only done once.
trans-unit.target: 避免多次计算昂贵的中间结果。Octave目前没有消除常见的子表达式。另外,对于变量来说,某些内部计算结果会被缓存。例如,如果一个矩阵变量被多次用作索引,检查索引(以及内部转换为整数)只需要做一次。

trans-unit.source: Avoid deep recursion. Function calls to m-file functions carry a relatively significant overhead, so rewriting a recursion as a loop often helps. Also, note that the maximum level of recursion is limited.
trans-unit.target: 避免深度递归。对m文件函数的调用会带来比较大的开销,所以把递归改写成循环往往会有帮助。另外,注意递归的最大级别是有限的。

trans-unit.source: Background Information: This function is called by an ode solver function if it was specified in the "OutputFcn" property of an options structure created with odeset. The ode solver will initially call the function with the syntax odeplot ([tfirst, tlast], y0, "init"). The function initializes internal variables, creates a new figure window, and sets the x limits of the plot. Subsequently, at each time step during the integration the ode solver calls odeplot (t, y, []). At the end of the solution the ode solver calls odeplot ([], [], "done") so that odeplot can perform any clean-up actions required.
trans-unit.target: 背景信息：如果在由 "OutputFcn" 创建的选项结构的“ OutputFcn”属性中指定了该函数，则它由ode求解器函数 odeset 。 ode求解器将首先使用语法 odeplot ([tfirst, tlast], y0, "init") 调用该函数。该函数初始化内部变量，创建一个新的图形窗口，并设置绘图的x极限。随后，在积分期间的每个时间步，ode求解器都会调用 odeplot (t, y, []) 。在解决方案的最后，ode求解器调用 odeplot ([], [], "done") 这样odeplot可以执行所需的任何清理操作。

trans-unit.source: Background: A matrix is Hermitian if the complex conjugate transpose of the matrix is equal to the original matrix: A == A'. If a tolerance is given then the calculation is norm (A - A', Inf) / norm (A, Inf) < tol.
trans-unit.target: 背景：如果矩阵的复共轭转置等于原始矩阵： A == A' 则该矩阵为Hermitian 。如果给出公差，则计算为 norm (A - A', Inf) / norm (A, Inf) < tol 。

trans-unit.source: Background: A matrix is symmetric if the transpose of the matrix is equal to the original matrix: A == A.'. If a tolerance is given then symmetry is determined by norm (A - A.', Inf) / norm (A, Inf) < tol.
trans-unit.target: 背景：一个矩阵是对称的，如果矩阵的转置是等于原始矩阵： A == A.' 。如果给出公差，则对称性由 norm (A - A.', Inf) / norm (A, Inf) < tol 。

trans-unit.source: Background: A positive definite matrix has eigenvalues which are all greater than zero. A positive semi-definite matrix has eigenvalues which are all greater than or equal to zero. The matrix <var>A</var> is very likely to be positive semi-definite if the following two conditions hold for a suitably small tolerance <var>tol</var>.
trans-unit.target: 背景：一个正定矩阵的特征值都大于零。一个正半定矩阵具有均大于或等于零的特征值。如果以下两个条件对于适当小的公差 <var>tol</var> 成立，则矩阵 <var>A</var> 很可能是正半定的。

trans-unit.source: Background: Array elements can be specified either by a linear index which starts at 1 and runs through the number of elements in the array, or they may be specified with subscripts for the row, column, page, etc. The functions ind2sub and sub2ind interconvert between the two forms.
trans-unit.target: 背景：数组元素可以由从1开始并贯穿数组元素数的线性索引指定，也可以由行，列，页面等的下标指定 ind2sub 和 sub2ind 函数可相互转换两种形式之间。

trans-unit.target: 背景:QR因式化在最小二乘问题的求解上有应用。QR因式化在解决最小二乘法问题方面有一定的应用。

(Sparse matrices only)

trans-unit.source: Because many other languages provide C or C++ APIs it is relatively simple to build bridges between Octave and other languages. This is also a way to bridge to hardware resources which often have device drivers written in C.
trans-unit.target: 因为许多其他语言提供了C或C++API,所以在Octave和其他语言之间建立桥接相对简单。这也是连接硬件资源的一种方式,因为硬件资源通常有用C语言编写的设备驱动程序。

trans-unit.source: Because oct-files are compiled functions they open up the possibility of crashing Octave through careless function calls or memory faults. It is quite important that each and every function have a sufficient level of parameter checking to ensure that Octave behaves well.
trans-unit.target: 因为oct-files是编译过的函数,所以它们有可能因为粗心的函数调用或内存故障而导致Octave崩溃。每一个函数都要有足够的参数检查,以确保Octave表现良好,这一点非常重要。

trans-unit.source: Before you evaluate an expression you need to substitute the values of the variables used in the expression. These are stored in the symbol table. Whenever the interpreter starts a new function it saves the current symbol table and creates a new one, initializing it with the list of function parameters and a couple of predefined variables such as nargin. Expressions inside the function use the new symbol table.
trans-unit.target: 在评估表达式之前，需要替换表达式中使用的变量的值。这些存储在符号表中。每当解释器启动新函数时，它将保存当前符号表并创建一个新符号表，并使用函数参数列表和几个预定义变量（如 nargin )对其进行初始化。函数内部的表达式使用新的符号表。

trans-unit.source: Breakpoints in class methods are also supported (e.g., dbstop ("@class/method")). However, breakpoints cannot be set in built-in functions (e.g., sin, etc.) or dynamically loaded functions (i.e., oct-files).

trans-unit.source: Broadcasting refers to how Octave binary operators and functions behave when their matrix or array operands or arguments differ in size. Since version 3.6.0, Octave now automatically broadcasts vectors, matrices, and arrays when using elementwise binary operators and functions. Broadly speaking, smaller arrays are “broadcast” across the larger one, until they have a compatible shape. The rule is that corresponding array dimensions must either
trans-unit.target: 广播是指八度二进制运算符和函数在其矩阵或数组操作数或参数的大小不同时的行为。从3.6.0版开始，Octave现在在使用元素智能二进制运算符和函数时自动广播矢量，矩阵和数组。广义上讲，较小的阵列在较大的阵列上“广播”，直到它们具有兼容的形状为止。规则是相应的数组维必须

trans-unit.source: By default (<var>c</var> omitted, or a particular column unspecified in <var>c</var>) an ascending sort order is used. However, if elements of <var>c</var> are negative then the corresponding column is sorted in descending order. If the elements of <var>A</var> are strings then a lexicographical sort is used.

trans-unit.source: By default accumarray returns a full matrix. If issparse is logically true, then a sparse matrix is returned instead.

trans-unit.source: By default S is assumed to be symmetric and the symmetric elimination tree is returned. The argument typ controls whether a symmetric or column elimination tree is returned. Valid values of typ are "sym" or "col", for symmetric or column elimination tree respectively.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，假设 S 是对称的，并且返回对称消除树。参数 typ 控制返回对称树还是列消除树。的有效值 typ 是 "sym" 或 "col" 分别为对称或列消除树。

trans-unit.source: By default callback functions are queued (they are executed one after the other in the event queue) unless the drawnow, figure, waitfor, getframe, or pause functions are used. If an executing callback invokes one of those functions, it causes Octave to flush the event queue, which results in the executing callback being interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，回调函数会排队（它们在事件队列中一个接一个地执行），除非使用了 drawnow ， figure ， waitfor ， getframe 或 pause 函数。如果正在执行的回调调用这些函数之一，则它将使Octave刷新事件队列，从而导致正在执行的回调被中断。

trans-unit.source: By default the arguments are evaluated with feval (@plot, x, y). However the type of plot can be modified with the fun argument, in which case the plots are generated by feval (fun, x, y). fun can be a function handle, an inline function, or a string of a function name.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，参数使用 feval (@plot, x, y) 求值。但是，可以使用 fun 参数修改图的类型，在这种情况下，图是通过 feval (fun, x, y) 。 fun 可以是函数句柄，内联函数或函数名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: By default, Octave’s image IO functions (imread, imwrite, and imfinfo) use the GraphicsMagick library for their operations. This means a vast number of image formats is supported but considering the large amount of image formats in science and its commonly closed nature, it is impossible to have a library capable of reading them all. Because of this, the function imformats keeps a configurable list of available formats, their extensions, and what functions should the image IO functions use. This allows one to expand Octave’s image IO capabilities by creating functions aimed at acting on specific file formats.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Octave的图像IO函数（ imread ， imwrite 和 imfinfo ）使用 GraphicsMagick 库进行操作。这意味着支持大量图像格式，但是考虑到科学中的大量图像格式及其通常封闭的性质，不可能拥有能够读取所有图像格式的库。正因为如此，该功能 imformats 保持可用的格式，其扩展和功能应该像IO功能，使用什么的可配置列表。通过创建针对特定文件格式的功能，这可以扩展Octave的图像IO功能。

trans-unit.source: By default, the generator is initialized from /dev/urandom if it is available, otherwise from CPU time, wall clock time, and the current fraction of a second. Note that this differs from MATLAB, which always initializes the state to the same state at startup. To obtain behavior comparable to MATLAB, initialize with a deterministic state vector in Octave’s startup files (see Startup Files).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果可用，则从 /dev/urandom 初始化生成器，否则从CPU时间，挂钟时间和当前秒数初始化。请注意，这不同于MATLAB，后者始终在启动时将状态初始化为相同状态。要获得可与MATLAB媲美的行为，请在Octave的启动文件（请参阅启动文件）中使用确定性状态向量进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: By default, the input array is interpreted as a hexadecimal number representing a double precision value. If fewer than 16 characters are given the strings are right padded with '0' characters.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，输入数组被解释为代表双精度值的十六进制数。如果给出的字符数少于16个，则将字符串用 '0' 字符正确填充。
